company_description: Agile Robots is an intelligent robot system development and application service provider, dedicated to the development and application of intelligent robot systems. The core products include 7-degree-of-freedom lightweight arm and general-purpose robot controller. , robot vision system, etc.
founders: Peter Meusel, Yuekai Zhao, Zhaopeng Chen
universities: FH Giessen, Harbin Institute of Tech
embedding_text: Agile Robots is an intelligent robot system development and application service provider, dedicated to the development and application of intelligent robot systems.
